name: Orange Explorer - Classic Retro Puzzle Platformer
name_original: Orange Explorer - Classic Retro Puzzle Platformer
description:
A classic puzzle platformer like in the old Mario days. 

Jump, destroy bricks with your head, collect points, slash and shot cute monsters.You have a sword, a gun and on later levels grenades and you must survive both macanical and "creature like" enemies that lunge at you or roam the land. I made it with only 15 levels because I am a solo game developer but the gameplay is hard so it should keep you entertain for some time for when you're bored. If you are nostalgic for a casual old school game like they made it in the 90's era I think you wold like this.

Has controller suport in Windows for gameplay.

Play it on your phone:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.HauresMihaiBogdan.OrangeExplorer
